article.Heading: SBI Chief on GST rollout: 'Smooth start but long way to go'
article.Summary: "Good start but a lot more needs to be done." That's SBI Chief, Arundathi Bhattacharya on how the GST regime has kicked off.
article.Body: "Good start but a lot more needs to be done." That's SBI Chief, Arundathi Bhattacharya on how the GST regime has kicked off. Bhattacharya and Nobel Laureate economist, Paul Krugman spoke to CNBC-TV18's Prashant Nair at the side lines of the bank's annual conclave. Krugman issued a warning of sorts to the market saying asset prices are not pricing a lot of risks. Not just that, Krugman went on to say that the United States is very close to a serious political and constitutional crisis.
